text.div:
NHSNReasonForInsertionCode

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/terminology/codesystem/cdcnhsn.html
    Code Display
    5105-2 To address a new indication for a central line
    5106-0 To replace an existing, malfunctioning central line
    5107-8 To replace an existing central line where infection was suspected

concept.display: To address a new indication for a central line
To replace an existing, malfunctioning central line
To replace an existing central line where infection was suspected
